name: Stuffed Cheese Spirals
author: LaDonna Langwell
summary: A quick appetizer using prepared dough and melted cheese. This would be equally good with a little crisp bacon inside!
ingredients: 1 tablespoon melted butter, or to taste  (Optional)
¼ cup shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
1 pinch garlic powder, or to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Spray a baking sheet with cooking spray
Unroll crescent roll dough on the prepared baking sheet
Spread butter over dough and sprinkle with Cheddar cheese and green onion
Roll dough back to its original shape
Cut dough with a sharp knife into 8 even slices
Arrange slices cut-side up on the baking sheet about 1 inch apart
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 9 to 12 minutes
